  overflow: hidden; }

  width: 100%; }

  color: #9999ff; }

  padding-left: 10px; }
.day-block.block.appointment .red {
  color: #d43e45; }
.day-block.block.appointment .top-row {
  width: 100%; }
.day-block.block.appointment .emp-name {
  margin-top: -9px;
  overflow: hidden;
  text-overflow: ellipsis;
  text-transform: capitalize; }
.day-block.block.appointment .emp-tenure {
  margin: 0 0 0 4px;
  text-transform: uppercase; }
.day-block.block.appointment .emp-spanish {
  margin: 0 0 0 4px; }
.day-block.block.appointment .alert {
  position: absolute;
  top: 2px; }
.day-block.block.appointment .bottom-container {
  width: 100%; }
.day-block.block.appointment .classicons {
  font-size: 13px; }
.day-block.block.appointment .position-icon {
  margin-top: -16px;
  margin-right: -12px; }

  font-size: 10px; }

    font-size: 16px; }

    display: none; }

    overflow: visible !important; }

    margin-top: -20px; }

    overflow: visible !important;
    text-overflow: ellipsis; }

    padding-bottom: 4px; }

    display: none; }

    overflow: visible !important;
    text-overflow: ellipsis; }

    width: 80%;

    overflow: visible !important;

    display: none; }

    margin-top: -20px; }
